snippet: A spate of gun violence left several people dead on Halloween evening, and a police officer committed suicide near his station house.
abstract: Rash of gun violence in New York City on Halloween leaves several people dead, including 19-year-old killed by man wearing mask and man shot to death by police during Bronx gun battle; also among dead is police officer who committed suicide outside his Bronx station house; police say there were seven shootings in total on Halloween, a rare spike in gun violence in city where crime rates have continued to fall.
lead_paragraph: A spate of gun violence left several people dead on Halloween evening, and a police officer committed suicide near his station house.

headline.main: Police in Bronx Kill Suspect; 3 Are Fatally Shot in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Police in Bronx Kill Suspect; 3 Are Fatally Shot in Brooklyn
